statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, engagement_level FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM user_interactions
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE engagement_level > 50 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(engagement_level) AS total_engagement FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_engagement > 100
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, engagement_level FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, engagement_level FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('like', 'comment') ORDER BY user_id, engagement_level ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, AVG(engagement_level) AS avg_engagement FROM user_interactions WHERE campaign_id = 5 GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, campaign_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, user_id, campaign_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, campaign_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, campaign_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, campaign_id FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_interactions > 10;
SELECT user_id, campaign_name, timestamp FROM interactions JOIN campaigns ON interactions.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_name, age FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT user_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Users JOIN Interactions ON Users.user_id = Interactions.user_id;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, click_timestamp, revenue FROM Interactions JOIN Clicks ON Interactions.interaction_id = Clicks.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM Users LIMIT 5
SELECT user_name, age FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT user_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Users JOIN Interactions ON Users.user_id = Interactions.user_id WHERE gender = 'Female'

SELECT user_name, campaign_name, click_timestamp, revenue FROM Users JOIN Interactions ON Users.user_id = Interactions.user_id JOIN Clicks ON Interactions.interaction_id = Clicks.interaction_id ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, clicks FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions WHERE conversion > 0;
SELECT user_id, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM marketing_campaigns c JOIN user_interactions u ON c.campaign_id = u.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM user_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC
SELECT target_id, target_name, target_segment_id, target_campaign_id FROM ad_targets WHERE target_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id
